{"version":9,"randomSeed":"e774ca20d79046c54f438efcdcb6cade","graph":{"viewport":{"xmin":-2.174200670828604,"ymin":-2.4863473141247967,"xmax":4.596205098519633,"ymax":2.3449078666212433},"showGrid":false,"showXAxis":false,"showYAxis":false},"expressions":{"list":[{"type":"folder","id":"42631","title":"Rotate","collapsed":true},{"type":"text","id":"42634","folderId":"42631","text":"Dot product"},{"type":"expression","id":"42632","folderId":"42631","color":"#6042a6","latex":"d_{1}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)=a_{1}b_{1}+a_{2}b_{2}+a_{3}b_{3}"},{"type":"text","id":"42636","folderId":"42631","text":"Cross product"},{"type":"expression","id":"42639","folderId":"42631","color":"#6042a6","latex":"d_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)=a_{2}b_{3}-a_{3}b_{2}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42706","folderId":"42631","color":"#388c46","latex":"d_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)=a_{3}b_{1}-a_{1}b_{3}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42707","folderId":"42631","color":"#6042a6","latex":"d_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)=a_{1}b_{2}-a_{2}b_{1}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42741","folderId":"42631","color":"#388c46","latex":"d_{2}\left(a,b\right)=\left[a\left[2\right]b\left[3\right]-a\left[3\right]b\left[2\right],a\left[3\right]b\left[1\right]-a\left[1\right]b\left[3\right],a\left[1\right]b\left[2\right]-a\left[2\right]b\left[1\right]\right]"},{"type":"text","id":"42629","folderId":"42631","text":"Rotation based on quaternions
a = vector
b = axis around rotate
theta = angle to rotate by"},{"type":"expression","id":"42705","folderId":"42631","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3},\theta\right)=\cos\left(\theta\right)a_{1}+\left(1-\cos\left(\theta\right)\right)\left(b_{1}\cdot\left(d_{1}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)\right)+\sin\left(\theta\right)\left(d_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42708","folderId":"42631","color":"#000000","latex":"r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3},\theta\right)=\cos\left(\theta\right)a_{2}+\left(1-\cos\left(\theta\right)\right)\left(b_{2}\cdot\left(d_{1}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)\right)+\sin\left(\theta\right)\left(d_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42709","folderId":"42631","color":"#c74440","latex":"r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3},\theta\right)=\cos\left(\theta\right)a_{3}+\left(1-\cos\left(\theta\right)\right)\left(b_{3}\cdot\left(d_{1}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)\right)+\sin\left(\theta\right)\left(d_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42739","folderId":"42631","color":"#c74440","latex":"r\left(a,b,\theta\right)=a\cos\left(\theta\right)+b\left(1-\cos\left(\theta\right)\right)\left(d_{1}\left(a\left[1\right],a\left[2\right],a\left[3\right],b\left[1\right],b\left[2\right],b\left[3\right]\right)\right)+\sin\left(\theta\right)d_{2}\left(a,b\right)"},{"type":"folder","id":"42649","title":"Camera","collapsed":true},{"type":"expression","id":"42650","folderId":"42649","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"c_{1}=0.244","slider":{"hardMin":true,"hardMax":true}},{"type":"expression","id":"42651","folderId":"42649","color":"#388c46","latex":"c_{2}=-0.18","slider":{"hardMin":true,"hardMax":true}},{"type":"expression","id":"42652","folderId":"42649","color":"#6042a6","latex":"c_{3}=0","slider":{"hardMin":true,"hardMax":true}},{"type":"expression","id":"42723","folderId":"42649","color":"#6042a6","latex":"e_{1}=2.1"},{"type":"expression","id":"42645","folderId":"42649","color":"#000000","latex":"\left(c_{2},c_{1}\right)"},{"type":"folder","id":"42643","title":"Functions","collapsed":true},{"type":"text","id":"42683","folderId":"42643","text":"Display Function"},{"type":"expression","id":"42644","folderId":"42643","color":"#388c46","latex":"D\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)=\left(R_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right),R_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42745","folderId":"42643","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"D_{1}\left(a\right)=\left(R\left(a\right)\left[1\right],R\left(a\right)\left[2\right]\right)"},{"type":"text","id":"42721","folderId":"42643","text":"Perspective Display Function"},{"type":"expression","id":"42722","folderId":"42643","color":"#388c46","latex":"P\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)=\frac{e_{1}}{R_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)-e_{1}}\cdot D\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42746","folderId":"42643","color":"#388c46","latex":"P_{1}\left(a\right)=\frac{e_{1}}{R\left(a\right)\left[3\right]-e_{1}}\cdot D\left(a\right)"},{"type":"text","id":"42679","folderId":"42643","text":"Euler Camera Rotation"},{"type":"expression","id":"42710","folderId":"42643","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"R_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)=r_{x}\left(r_{x}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{y}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{z}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),0,0,1,c_{3}\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42711","folderId":"42643","color":"#388c46","latex":"R_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)=r_{y}\left(r_{x}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{y}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{z}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),0,0,1,c_{3}\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42712","folderId":"42643","color":"#6042a6","latex":"R_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\right)=r_{z}\left(r_{x}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{y}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),r_{z}\left(r_{x}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{y}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),r_{z}\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},1,0,0,c_{1}\right),0,1,0,c_{2}\right),0,0,1,c_{3}\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42743","folderId":"42643","color":"#000000","latex":"R\left(a\right)=r\left(r\left(r\left(a,\left[1,0,0\right],c_{1}\right),\left[0,1,0\right],c_{2}\right),\left[0,0,1\right],c_{3}\right)"},{"type":"text","id":"42725","folderId":"42643","text":"Distance"},{"type":"expression","id":"42726","folderId":"42643","color":"#c74440","latex":"d\left(a_{1},a_{2},a_{3},b_{1},b_{2},b_{3}\right)=\sqrt{\left(a_{1}-b_{1}\right)^{2}+\left(a_{2}-b_{2}\right)^{2}+\left(a_{3}-b_{3}\right)^{2}}"},{"type":"text","id":"42763","folderId":"42643","text":"Normalize"},{"type":"expression","id":"42764","folderId":"42643","color":"#c74440","latex":"n\left(a\right)=\frac{a}{d\left(a\left[1\right],a\left[2\right],a\left[3\right],0,0,0\right)}"},{"type":"folder","id":"42664","title":"Axis","collapsed":true},{"type":"expression","id":"42665","folderId":"42664","color":"#c74440","latex":"D\left(1,0,0\right)t","parametricDomain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"},"domain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"}},{"type":"expression","id":"42666","folderId":"42664","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"D\left(0,1,0\right)t","parametricDomain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"},"domain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"}},{"type":"expression","id":"42667","folderId":"42664","color":"#388c46","latex":"D\left(0,0,1\right)t","parametricDomain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"},"domain":{"min":"-l","max":"l"}},{"type":"expression","id":"42663","folderId":"42664","color":"#000000","latex":"l=1","slider":{"hardMin":true,"min":"0"}},{"type":"folder","id":"42788","title":"Vector Functions","collapsed":true},{"type":"expression","id":"42759","folderId":"42788","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"v_{x}\left(x,y,z\right)=xy-\frac{8}{3}z"},{"type":"expression","id":"42766","folderId":"42788","color":"#388c46","latex":"v_{y}\left(x,y,z\right)=x\left(28-z\right)-y"},{"type":"expression","id":"42767","folderId":"42788","color":"#6042a6","latex":"v_{z}\left(x,y,z\right)=10\left(y-x\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42769","folderId":"42788","color":"#c74440","latex":"m\left(x,y,z\right)=d\left(v_{x}\left(x,y,z\right),v_{y}\left(x,y,z\right),v_{z}\left(x,y,z\right),0,0,0\right)"},{"type":"folder","id":"42751","title":"Vector Field"},{"type":"expression","id":"42789","folderId":"42751","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"k=2"},{"type":"expression","id":"42753","folderId":"42751","color":"#c74440","latex":"s=10","slider":{"hardMin":true,"hardMax":true,"min":"1","max":"100","step":"1"}},{"type":"expression","id":"42774","folderId":"42751","color":"#c74440","latex":"i=0.1"},{"type":"expression","id":"42752","folderId":"42751","color":"#000000","latex":"l_{1}=\left[1,...,s^{3}\right]"},{"type":"expression","id":"42754","folderId":"42751","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"x_{1}=k\cdot\frac{\left(\operatorname{mod}\left(l_{1}-1,s\right)-\frac{s-1}{2}\right)}{s}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42756","folderId":"42751","color":"#6042a6","latex":"y_{1}=k\cdot\frac{\left(\operatorname{mod}\left(\operatorname{floor}\left(\frac{l_{1}-1}{s}\right),s\right)-\frac{s-1}{2}\right)}{s}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42757","folderId":"42751","color":"#000000","latex":"z_{1}=k\cdot\frac{\left(\operatorname{floor}\left(\frac{l_{1}-1}{s^{2}}\right)-\frac{s-1}{2}\right)}{s}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42771","folderId":"42751","color":"#388c46","latex":"m_{1}=m\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)"},{"type":"expression","id":"42768","folderId":"42751","color":"#000000","latex":"x_{2}=i\cdot\frac{v_{x}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42770","folderId":"42751","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"y_{2}=i\cdot\frac{v_{y}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42772","folderId":"42751","color":"#6042a6","latex":"z_{2}=i\cdot\frac{v_{z}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}}"},{"type":"expression","id":"42758","folderId":"42751","color":"#c74440","latex":"p_{1}=P\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)","label":"${l1}","hidden":true,"pointSize":"3"},{"type":"expression","id":"42773","folderId":"42751","color":"#000000","latex":"p_{2}=P\left(x_{1}+x_{2},y_{1}+y_{2},z_{1}+z_{2}\right)","label":"${l1}","hidden":true,"pointSize":"3"},{"type":"expression","id":"42783","folderId":"42751","color":"#388c46","latex":"D\left(i\cdot\frac{v_{x}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}},i\cdot\frac{v_{y}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}},i\cdot\frac{v_{z}\left(x_{1},y_{1},z_{1}\right)}{m_{1}}\right)","hidden":true},{"type":"expression","id":"42786","color":"#2d70b3","latex":"p_{1}+t\left(p_{2}-p_{1}\right)"}]}}
data.title: Vector Field 3D
